description: This file contains mock implementations for testing utility functions, including external C functions and references to a global mock object. It sets up mock behavior for system and access functions used in testing scenarios.

classes.name: UtilsMock
classes.description: A mock class used for testing utility functions, with methods to simulate system and file access operations.

methods.name: int v_secure_system(const char * cmd,...)
methods.description: Externally defined C function that formats a command string and delegates execution to the mock object.

methods.name: int access(const char * pathname,int mode)
methods.description: Externally defined C function that delegates filesystem access checks to the mock object.

ctags.name: access
ctags.pattern: /^extern "C" int access(const char * pathname, int mode)$/
